Control Name: PERF 7.3 Establish Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to measure workload performance
Control Statement: Identify the KPIs that indicate whether the workload is performing as intended. For example, an API-based workload might use overall response latency as an indication of overall performance, and an e-commerce site might choose to use the number of purchases as its KPI.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 7.3 Establish Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to measure workload performance
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you monitor your resources to ensure they are performing?
